Subjective: Constipation for 3 months; Hard stools every 2-3 days; Abdominal cramps; Swollen stomach; No changes in eating habits; Underweight, no recent weight loss; No blood in stool; Tried olive oil for softening stools; No family history of bowel problems; Sister has ulcerative colitis; Normal urination; Regular menstruation.
Objective: Abdomen: Normal bowel sounds, varying tympani, sensitive in lower left quadrant, dampening in lower left quadrant.
Plan: 1. Psyllium fibre sachets daily for 6 weeks. 2. Follow-up in 6 weeks to evaluate results. 3. Safety net: Report worsening abdominal pain, fever, or blood in stool. 4. Discuss referral to dietitian next visit.
